content:
Light on his feet, the character dodges and weaves as he
moves, skills learned from long years in the line of fire. When
the character performs a Charge or Run Action, opponents
suffer a -20 penalty to Ballistic Skill Tests made to hit the
character with a ranged weapon. This penalty continues until
the start of the character's next turn.
